source:
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
One of the Mol delegates seeks the aid of someone brave enough to wade through the terrors of the city.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
ガレアン・ドモルム区のモル族の派遣団員は、冒険者に友軍部隊の捜索を依頼したいようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_TODO_00<tab>Search for the wounded soldier and subdue any hostile imperials with the numbing powder.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_TODO_00派遣団の負傷兵を探し
帝国兵に襲われたら、弱らせてを使う
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_TODO_01<tab>派遣団の負傷兵を救助する

source: TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_000<tab>Thank goodness you're here─ We've just received an urgent request for aid from one of our own via linkpearl.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_000英雄殿、至急ご協力を願えないでしょうか？
友軍部隊からの救援要請が、
リンクパール通信で届いたところなんです！

source: TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_001<tab>Alas, we could not make out their location, though it sounded as if they were in the throes of a fearsome struggle. We've sent out scouts to ascertain his whereabouts, but they're few in number. Might you aid in their efforts?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_001しかし交戦中なのか激しい物音がして、現在地が掴みきれず……。
すでに捜索隊を出しましたが、まだ人手が足りません。
貴方にもご助力願えないでしょうか？

source: TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_002<tab>Your cooperation is much appreciated. I bid you begin your search near the Senaculum Imperialis. Our fellows have yet to explore it.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_002ありがとうございます！
貴方にお願いしたいのは、ガレマール元老院周辺での、
捜索活動になります！

source: TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_003<tab>Should any tempered imperial forces attempt to waylay you, I ask that you merely subdue them─<var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> kill them. To that end, I offer you this powder. It shall render any hostile immobile for a time.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_003もし襲撃者がテンパード状態の帝国兵であれば、
命を奪うことはせず、しばらく動けないよう無力化させたいのです。
それには、この「」をお使いください。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_005<tab>The tempered imperial forces that stalk these city streets are to be pitied. They did not choose their fate, after all. I ask that you spare any you find─Garlemald has experienced enough bloodshed for many, many lifetimes...
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_005もし襲撃者がテンパード状態の帝国兵であれば、
この「」をお使いください。
私はここで連絡係を務めますので……！

source: TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_INJUREDSOLDIER04230_000_010<tab>I certainly did not expect you of all people to come to my rescue! And you are arrived just in the nick of time... Had you come any later, I fear you may have been forced to carry a load of dead weight back to camp.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_INJUREDSOLDIER04230_000_010まさか貴方に助けていただけるとは……！
来てくださり、ありがとうございます。
本当に危ないところでした……！

source: TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_INJUREDSOLDIER04230_000_011<tab>I was on my rounds when I heard what I assumed to be a refugee crying for help. I made to aid the poor soul when some imperial wretch set upon me. Looking at it with a more critical eye, that “refugee” may have been nothing but bait for a trap.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_INJUREDSOLDIER04230_000_011避難民風の男性が、助けを求めていたのです。
近寄ったところ、後ろから現れた帝国兵たちに襲われてしまい……
最初から、派遣団員をおびき寄せる罠だったのでしょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_INJUREDSOLDIER04230_000_012<tab>My head was muddled from the chaos of it all, but I swear I heard the man speak the name “Lord Nerva.” If my ears did not deceive me, this would mean remnants of the IIIrd Legion are still abroad, and they perhaps aim to fleece us of both provisions and arms.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_INJUREDSOLDIER04230_000_012男は、ネルウァとの名前を口にのぼらせていました。
第III軍団の生き残りたちが、
兵糧や装備を奪おうと暗躍しているのかもしれません。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_INJUREDSOLDIER04230_000_013<tab>That deserter must be brought in for questioning before the effects of that compound of yours wears off. I shall return to the station at once to report in and ensure that our forces have captured the scoundrel.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_INJUREDSOLDIER04230_000_013麻痺させて動きを封じた者は、仲間を呼んで捕縛してもらいます。
ともかく、はやく直接無事を報告しなければ……
一旦、テルティウム駅まで戻ることにしましょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_015<tab>There you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I have been awaiting your return. Our comrade reported in just moments ago, and I have heard all. Not only did you save him from the hands of that imperial, but you provided us the opportunity for his capture.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_015英雄殿！　おかえりなさいませ。
戻ってきた仲間から、無事状況の報告を受けることができました。
貴方のおかげで、彼も命を救われたというものでしょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_016<tab>The men I sent out to apprehend that blackguard have sent word that he is <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> in fact tempered as we had assumed. Rather, he's one of many who are determined to fight until the bitter end. As invaders in their lands, we've drawn their ire.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_016追って帝国兵の身柄を拘束しにいった仲間からの連絡によれば、
捉えた人物はどうやら、テンパードではなかったようです。
帝都から派遣団を排斥せんとする、タカ派の連中だったのかと。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_017<tab>I have my fair share of misgivings about any who fight under the imperial standard, but considering the circumstances...surely it would be in the interest of both sides to lay down our weapons─to make at least an attempt at cooperation.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_017私とて帝国軍に、思うところがない訳ではありません。
しかし、この状況なのですから、お互いに武器を収め、
理性的に協力できれば良いのですが……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_018<tab>But such idle musings can be saved for less troublous times, I suppose. Oh yes, how foolish of me─I nearly forgot. The fellow you saved earlier, he asked me to give you this as thanks for your help.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD006_04230_MOLSOLDIER04230_000_018ともかく、この度はご協力ありがとうございました。
救助された仲間からも、礼の品を預かりましたよ。
よろしければ、受け取ってやってください。
